resources.string: Track and Field is a fast sport.
Hurdles is not a race which the runner jumps over barriers while running.
During sprinting races, you use starting blocks to start from.
The 100 metres dash is the first event on day one of the decathlon.
Gail Devers became the first woman in 1988 to run the 100 metres in under 10.5
New quiz score on Track and Field app
